45.name: Blessing of Stone I
45.Description: Increases Maximum HP by 10%, All Elemental Defense by 50, Physical Def by 10 of a target within a 25m radius for 30m.

54.name: Hit Mantra I
54.Description:
Increases Crit Strike by 50, Magic Crit by 50, Strike Resist by 50, and Spell Resist by 50 for you and your group members within a 20m radius.
Active Skill

44.name: Enhancement Mantra I
44.Description:
Increases Stun Resistance of you and your group members within 20m radius of you by 500.
Active Skill.

50.name: Invincibility Mantra I
50.Description:
Recovers the MP of the caster and group members within a 20m radius by 32, and also increases Physical Attack, Physical Def, and Magic Boost.
Active Skill.

20.name: Healing Conduit I
20.Description: For 10 sec, HP of the caster and group members is restored by 23 whenever the target suffers damage. But only those who stay within 5m radius of the target can restore their HP.

25.name: Healing Conduit II
25.Description: For 10 sec, HP of the caster and group members is restored by 29 whenever the target suffers damage. But only those who stay within 5m radius of the target can restore their HP.

31.name: Healing Conduit III
31.Description: For 10 sec, HP of the caster and group members is restored by 35 whenever the target suffers damage. But only those who stay within 5m radius of the target can restore their HP.

37.name: Healing Conduit IV
37.Description: For 10 sec, HP of the caster and group members is restored by 41 whenever the target suffers damage. But only those who stay within 5m radius of the target can restore their HP.

43.name: Healing Conduit V
43.Description: For 10 sec, HP of the caster and group members is restored by 47 whenever the target suffers damage. But only those who stay within 5m radius of the target can restore their HP.

49.name: Healing Conduit VI
49.Description: For 10 sec, HP of the caster and group members is restored by 57 whenever the target suffers damage. But only those who stay within 5m radius of the target can restore their HP.

55.name: Healing Conduit VII
55.Description: For 10 sec, HP of the caster and group members is restored by 70 whenever the target suffers damage. But only those who stay within 5m radius of the target can restore their HP.

48.name: Soul Crush I
48.Description: Deals 546~550 physical damage to a stunned target and causes it to become Stumbled.

54.name: Soul Crush II
54.Description: Deals 664~668 physical damage to a stunned target and causes it to become Stumbled.

45.name: Blessing of Wind I
45.Description: For 30s, there is a 10% chance of inflicting additional 189 damage to the target each time you attack.

48.name: Blessing of Wind II
48.Description: For 30s, there is a 10% chance of inflicting additional 196 damage to the target each time you attack.

51.name: Blessing of Wind III
51.Description: For 30s, there is a 10% chance of inflicting additional 218 damage to the target each time you attack.

54.name: Blessing of Wind IV
54.Description: For 30s, there is a 10% chance of inflicting additional 239 damage to the target each time you attack.

40.name: Word of Inspiration I
40.Description: Increases Magic Boost by 100, Accuracy by 100, and Physical Attack by 20% of your group members within a 20m radius of you for 15s.

28.name: Word of Protection I
28.Description: Increases Evasion, Parry, Block by 100 and All Elemental Defense by 100 of your group members within a 20m radius of you for 15s.

Target: Area within a Radius of Target

55.name: Elemental Screen I
55.Description: Increases the Physical Def and All Elemental Defense of you and up to 6 allies within a 20m radius by 2000 and 200 for 30s.

34.name: Word of Life I
34.Description: Heals all group members within 20m of you by 353 every 2s for 10s.

40.name: Word of Life II
40.Description: Heals all group members within 20m of you by 409 every 2s for 10s.

46.name: Word of Life III
46.Description: Heals all group members within 20m of you by 463 every 2s for 10s.

52.name: Word of Life IV
52.Description: Heals all group members within 20m of you by 509 every 2s for 10s.

50.name: Mountain Crash I
50.Description: Inflicts 1425~1429 damage to a target within a 25m radius, and deals periodic 103 damage every 3s for 12s.

53.name: Mountain Crash II
53.Description: Inflicts 1476~1480 damage to a target within a 25m radius, and deals periodic 109 damage every 3s for 12s.

45.name: Magic Recovery I
45.Description: Recovers the MP of the caster or a target within a 25m radius by 1995.

48.name: Magic Recovery II
48.Description: Recovers the MP of the caster or a target within a 25m radius by 2141.

51.name: Magic Recovery III
51.Description: Recovers the MP of the caster or a target within a 25m radius by 2287.

54.name: Magic Recovery IV
54.Description: Recovers the MP of the caster or a target within a 25m radius by 2433.

20.name: Rage Spell I
20.Description: For 30m, your Physical Attack increases by 15%. But in the meantime, your healing skill casting time increases by 20%.

22.name: Protective Ward I
22.Description: Creates a protective shield for 10s that has a 10% chance of blocking damage whenever you are hit by attack, and increases your resistance to Stumble and Stun. The protective shield blocks 30% damage from each attack.

28.name: Protective Ward II
28.Description: Creates a protective shield for 10s that has a 10% chance of blocking damage whenever you are hit by attack, and increases your resistance to Stumble and Stun. The protective shield blocks 33% damage from each attack.

34.name: Protective Ward III
34.Description: Creates a protective shield for 10s that has a 10% chance of blocking damage whenever you are hit by attack, and increases your resistance to Stumble and Stun. The protective shield blocks 36% damage from each attack.

40.name: Protective Ward IV
40.Description: Creates a protective shield for 10s that has a 10% chance of blocking damage whenever you are hit by attack, and increases your resistance to Stumble and Stun. The protective shield blocks 39% damage from each attack.

46.name: Protective Ward V
46.Description: Creates a protective shield for 10s that has a 10% chance of blocking damage whenever you are hit by attack, and increases your resistance to Stumble and Stun. The protective shield blocks 42% damage from each attack.

52.name: Protective Ward VI
52.Description: Creates a protective shield for 10s that has a 10% chance of blocking damage whenever you are hit by attack, and increases your resistance to Stumble and Stun. The protective shield blocks 44% damage from each attack.

52.name: Disorienting Blow I
52.Description: Inflicts 236~240 physical damage on the target and puts it in the Stumbled state.

55.name: Disorienting Blow II
55.Description: Inflicts 255~259 physical damage on the target and puts it in the Stumbled state.

55.name: Numbing Blow I
55.Description: Inflicts 615~619 damage to the target, increasing the target's casting time by 50%, and decreasing the target's Attack Speed for 7s.

43.name: Soul Lock I
43.Description: Inflicts 497 ~ 501 physical damage on a stunned or stumbled target within a 25 m radius and binds it for 3s.

55.name: Soul Lock II
55.Description: Inflicts 628 ~ 632 physical damage on a stunned or stumbled target within a 25 m radius and binds it for 3s.

40.name: Splash Swing I
40.Description: Upon successful parry, inflicts 747~751 damage to the target.

46.name: Splash Swing II
46.Description: Upon successful parry, inflicts 855~859 damage to the target.

52.name: Splash Swing III
52.Description: Upon successful parry, inflicts 1107~1111 damage to the target.

Target: Area within a Radius of Target

50.name: Divine Curtain I
50.Description: Creates a shield for 15s that has a 10% chance of blocking damage each time you and up to 12 allies within a 20m radius receive attack, and also recovers 493 HP every 3s (The shield blocks 55% of the damage you receive per attack until it blocks a total of 5000 damage).

Target: Area within a Radius of Target

45.name: Ancestral Word of Spellstopping I
45.Description: Stigma skill of an Ancient Daeva. Creates a protective shield for 15s that blocks damage with 10% probability each time you and allies within a 20m radius receive attack, and recovers HP by 331 every 3s. (The shield blocks 40% of the damage you receive each time. It remains effective until it absorbs a total of 5000 damage.)

Target: Area within a Radius of Target

50.name: Curtain of Aether I
50.Description: Creates a shield for 15s that has a 10% chance of blocking damage each time you and up to 12 allies within a 20m radius receive attack (The shield blocks 65% of the damage you receive per attack until it blocks a total of 5000 damage).

Target: Area within a Radius of Target

45.name: Ancestral Aetheric Field I
45.Description: Stigma skill of an Ancient Daeva. Creates a protective shield for 15s that can block damage with 10% probability each time you and allies within a 20m radius receive attack. (The shield blocks 50% of the damage you receive each time. It remains effective until it absorbs a total of 5000 damage.)

45.name: Recovery Spell I
45.Description: Heals a target within 25m of you by 771, and additionally heals them by 771 every 2s for 6s.

51.name: Recovery Spell II
51.Description: Heals a target within 25m of you by 854, and additionally heals them by 854 every 2s for 6s.

52.name: Healing Burst I
52.Description: Heals a target within 23m of you by 3184.

55.name: Healing Burst II
55.Description: Heals a target within 23m of you by 3327.

28.name: Binding Word I
28.Description: Binds and reduces the Movement Speed of a target within 25m for 5s. The duration decreases if the target is a player.

25.name: Promise of Aether I
25.Description: For 30m, you have a 0.5% chance of recovering MP with each attack.

37.name: Promise of Aether II
37.Description: For 30m, you have a 0.5% chance of recovering MP with each attack.

49.name: Promise of Aether III
49.Description: For 30m, you have a 0.5% chance of recovering MP with each attack.

55.name: Promise of Aether IV
55.Description: For 30m, you have a 0.5% chance of recovering MP with each attack.
